## AccountManager.fetch() method

Fetch a RIOT account by its unique PUUID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(id: string, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<Account>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The PUUID of the RIOT account. |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetching options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Account](./shieldbow.account.md)<!-- -->&gt;
